Package dontlookback

Class StateManager

java.lang.Object
dontlookback.StateManager
public class StateManager extends Object
Comprehensive State Management System Manages game state transitions, state stacking for complex scenarios, and provides event-driven state change notifications. Supports both single states and composite state scenarios (e.g., PLAYING + HIDING + UNSAFE). Features: - Thread-safe state management - State transition validation - State change event system - State stack for complex scenarios - Automatic state conflict resolution - Debug and logging capabilities
Version:
1.0
Author:
DLB Team
